description: Knitted sweater in lambswool blend with classic shawl collar and slightly marbled yarn. Perfect for everyday use over a shirt or as a warm middle layer on an autumn/winter walk. Corozo buttons and eyelets in G-1000 Original. Ribbed sleeve cuffs and hem. Leather logo on the sleeve. Regular fit.
name: Fjallraven Lada Sweater - Mens
